name: Lucky Mark
description:
This is a sandbox game with role-playing elements, in which you become a young programmer. You move to the house of your boss, where the main events will take place.
The game consists of two parts:
INTRO - an introductory part in the form of a visual novel.
GAME - a sandbox and logical continuation of INTRO.

An incredibly challenging sandbox game! It will not be easy! Forget everything you've played before - and don't say you weren't warned!
A lot of stats that affect the game: hunger, physical attractiveness, education, imagination, lust, vigor, affection from other characters in the game and so on - you will have to try hard to keep them at the right level! A lot of explicit scenes will be revealed to you if you are persistent and persevering!
